Title: Amateur Putting 2m
Description: Make 3 putts in a row from 2 meter distance

Title: Amateur Putting 3m
Description: Make 5 putts with 10 attempts from 3 meters

Title: Lag Putting 10m
Description: Hit 2 putts inside 2 meters of the hole from 10 meters

Title: Speed Control 4m
Description: Get 3 putts to go in the hole or stop 0.5m past the hole from 4 meters

Title: 7m distance control
Description: From 7 meters get 2 balls inside 1.5 meters with 10 attempts

Title: Chip 10m Rough
Description: Hit 10 chip shots from 8m in the rough and get at least 2 shots to stop within 2 meters of the hole

Title: Good 0.5m Putting
Description: Make 10 out of 10 putts from 0.5 meters

Title: 0.5m Putting
Description: Make 5 consecutive putts around the hole from 0.5 meters

Title: Up and Down Rough
Description: Make 1 up and down from 15 meters away in the rough

Title: Rough 10m
Description: Chip 3 balls in a row inside 4 meters of the hole

Title: 1m putts
Description: Make 6 putts from 1 meter with 10 attempts

Title: Amateur Bunker 12m
Description: Hit 10 bunker shots from 15m and get at least 2 shots to finish on the green within 5 meters of the hole

Title: Good Bunker Shot
Description: Hit 1 bunker shot onto the green within 3 meters (Any distance)

Title: Speed Ladder 6-8m
Description: Hit the ball in the hole or 1m past the hole from 6m, 7m, 8 meters

Title: Pressure Putt 1m
Description: Make 1 putt from 1 meter with 2 attempts

Title: Amateur Chip 10m
Description: Hit 10 chip shots from 10m and get at least 2 shots to stop within 2 meters of the hole (Fairway)

Title: Amateur Pitch 20m
Description: Hit 10 pitch shots from 20m and get at least 2 shots to stop within 5 meters of the hole (Fairway)

Title: Amateur Pitch 25m
Description: Hit 10 pitch shots from 25m and get at least 2 shots to stop within 5 meters of the hole (Rough)

Title: Amateur Approach 40m
Description: Pick a target 40m away. Hit 1 ball left of the target, make sure it carrys past 40 meters and finishes no more than 20 meters left of the target

Title: Amateur Approach 50m
Description: Pick a target 50m away. Hit 1 ball right of the target, make sure it carrys past 40 meters and finishes no more than 20 meters right of the target

Title: Lag Putting 12m
Description: Hit 3 putts inside 2 meters of the hole from 12 meters

Title: Up and Down Rougher
Description: Make 2 up and downs from 15m away in the Rough (10 attempts)

Title: Distance Control Putt 5m
Description: Get 2 balls to stop within 0.5m past the hole from 5 meters

Title: Amateur Wedge 60m Left
Description: Pick a target 60m away. Hit a ball left of the target, and make sure it finishes no more than 20 meters left of the target.

Title: Amateur Wedge 60m
Description: Pick a target 60m away. Hit a ball right of the target, and make sure it finishes no more than 20 meters right of the target

Title: Zone Carry Drill 80m
Description: Hit 3 out of 10 balls that clearly carry the 80m sign. (With a club that goes around 80 meters)

Title: Direction Control 100-120m
Description: Hit 3 out of 10 shots that land between the 100m and 120m markers

Title: Chip Challenge 9 iron
Description: Use a 9 iron and chip 3 within 5 meters of the hole from 15 meters (Fairway)

Title: Chip Height Fairway
Description: Hit one high and one low chip inside 5 meters of the hole from 15m (Fairway)

Title: Chip Height Rough
Description: Hit one high and one low chip inside 5 meters of the hole from 15m (Rough)

Title: Lag Putting 8-10m
Description: Hit the ball inside a 1m circle of the hole from 8m, 9m, 10 meters

Title: 10 Putts 0.5m
Description: Make 10 putts around the hole in a row from 0.5 meter

Title: Amateur Bunker Escape 3m
Description: Hit 1 bunker shot onto the green within 5 meters (Any distance)

Title: Pitch Control 40m
Description: Stop 3 pitches within 5m of the hole from 40m (Rough)

Description: Get 3 balls to stop within 0.5m past the hole from 5 meters

Description: Pick a target 70m away. Hit a ball left of the target, and make sure it finishes no more than 20 meters left of the target.

Description: Hit 3 consecutive clean shots that reach the 80m marker
